QuestData.Title: A Clew of Worms
QuestData.Description: While I was scouting, I noticed that most of Frostwind Crag is crawling with an odd species of worm.$B$BThe worst thing about them is that these things burrow under the ground and then spring on you from out of nowhere.$B$BI saw the worms attacking the frost wolves and other wildlife in the wastes. I'm certain the orcs would appreciate you helping out.
QuestData.RewardText: We haven't seen these creatures here in a generation.$B$BTheir sudden appearance and the shaking of the ground are most definitely connected.
